english.segment1: When I think about and remember how. There was no way out and You rescued me. There's no reason why. You loved me then and You love me now. Least, no reason I can see
english.segment2: You had always been my closest friend. Even though I'd never defended that. I was so far away. As far as ever I could stray. But You were there to bring me back
english.segment3: Thank You Jesus. For the grace that You have given us. We could never repay. But from my heart I'd like to say. That I thank You
english.segment4: There's so much to learn about how to turn. All Your words of life that burn in me. Into a living fountain. Flowing deep and flowing clean. So that all can come and drink
english.segment5: But I know you're right there. Willing to prepare. This open heart of mine to carry on. To the place where I can be. Your servant, be Your friend. One that You can depend on
